articles.title: Sri Lanka overtake Pakistan to climb World Test Championship standings - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The island nation move up to fourth on the latest standings courtesy of their impressive victory, while Bangladesh drop to equal seventh.
articles.content:
Sri Lanka have boosted their chances of reaching next year's ICC World Test Championship final with an emphatic 192-run victory over Bangladesh in the second Test in Chattogram.
